channel.title: Run.bat is going down
channel.description: If i open my server (RUN.BAT) hes still going down so i cant play on my server i open and in 0,1 sec is it closed can some people help me??

item.title: Run.bat is going down
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

dylan mast:

If i open my server (RUN.BAT) hes still going down so i cant play on my server i open and in 0,1 sec is it closed can some people help me??

Just incase you dont know how to, right click your run.bat and at the bottom type in pause should look something like this…

@echo off title run.bat Java java java thing pause

then open it up again, and it should let you see the error, then copy and paste it as andrew said.
(select all, enter)

Oh, idk if thats what your asking, ok uhm.

Right click your run.bat and copy all that code stuff, and paste it as a reply.

Read full topic
